channel.title: How to make skills max at 99?
channel.description: Ok i looked at that return 99; thing and they are all at 99; so why are they going over 99? 317 allstarscape

item.title: How to make skills max at 99?
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

Go to ( ( client.java ) ) and search for

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {

You should come across something like this

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) { int points = 0; int output = 0; if (exp > 13034430) return 99; for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double) lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0)); output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; } } return 0; }

This

if (exp > 13034430)

Is the max xp amount you need to gain to reach the max lvl of your stat.

This

return 99;

Is your max skill lvl.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make skills max at 99?
